response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is a valuable asset that holds significant worth, and I believe it would greatly benefit you. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
